author: joeswatosh
msg: Use common idiom for deciding if the method is to operate on a working copy
or a repository.  Effectively reverts part of r26221.
(Svn::Client::Context#merge_peg2): Use same idiom used in other methods in
this class to determine if we are acting on a working copy or repository.

Fix various doc strings to use correct doxygen syntax.

author: hwright
msg: Update our doxygen configuration file to be compatible with recent releases of
